diagrams.title: Knowledge Distillation
diagrams.description: Teacher Model → Soft Labels → Student Model → Match Distributions → Compressed Model

diagrams.title: Pruning
diagrams.description: Train Full Model → Identify Important Weights → Remove Low-Magnitude → Fine-tune → Smaller Model

diagrams.title: Quantization
diagrams.description: FP32 Weights → INT8 Conversion → Calibration → Quantized Model → Faster Inference
